mapper.select: select exp_seq, id, exp_subject, exp_content, exp_image, exp_readcount, to_char(exp_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as exp_date from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from exp order by exp_seq desc) tt) where rn>=#{startNum} and rn<=#{endNum}
select count(*) as cnt from exp

select exp_seq, id, exp_subject, exp_content, exp_image, exp_readcount, to_char(exp_date, 'YYYY.MM.DD') as exp_date from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from exp order by exp_seq desc) tt) where exp_subject like #{search} or exp_content like #{search}
select count(*) as cnt from exp where exp_subject like #{search} or exp_content like #{search}
mapper.update: update exp set exp_readcount = exp_readcount+1 where exp_seq=#{seq}
update exp set exp_subject=#{exp_subject}, exp_content=#{exp_content}, exp_image=#{exp_image} where exp_seq=#{exp_seq}
mapper.select: select id, exp_reply_seq, exp_seq, exp_reply_content, exp_reply_date from (select rownum rn, tt.* from (select * from exp_reply order by exp_reply_seq desc) tt) where exp_seq=#{seq}
